1970 14 Lee got pregnant and sent to a home for unwed mothers
Her natural father hangs himself in prison (psychopathic Child
07/071971 15 Britta Wuornos dies from liver failure
07/161976 21 Her Brother Keith dies of cancer

column3: Arrested and charged with auto theft
Arrested for threatening a man with a pistol and demanding money.Bailed
Meets Tyria Moore at Daytona gay bar
Lee & Tyria move into a trailer at Ormond-by-the-Sea
Richard Mallory murdered & later his car is discovered
Richard Mallory’s body found on side of road
Spear’s body discovered found in woods of Citrus Co. FL
Unidentified body found in Pasco Co.; later identified as CharlesCarskaddon
Lee & Tyria crash Peter Siem’s car
Dick Humphreys’s body found in Marion Co. FL
Bobby Lee Copus picks up Lee and narrowly escapes with his life
Lee throws her murder weapon into Rose Bay and promises Tyriashe will not kill again
Lee spotted by police at the Port Orange Pub
Tryia located in Pennsylvania, comes back to Florida and speaks toLee on the phone at the jail
Lee confesses to one of the murders, claims self-defense
Indicted for the murder of Richard Mallory
Arlene Pralle and husband adopt Lee
Lee found guilty of the murder of Richard Mallory
Sentenced to death, received at the Broward Correctional Institute,Death Row
Pleads ‘no contest’ to the murders of Humphreys, Burress, andSpears

column2: Finding out her grandparents were not her biologicalparents
Poor student, could not concentrate, set roll of toiletpaper on fire
Had burns on face & arms, good looks, neat figure
Beat by grandfather with branch from willow tree
Claims she had intercourse with her grandfather andbrother
